name: The Witch's Isle
description: An adventure game that takes place in a dream-like town on a solitary island.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 200 MB available space
